alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:59PM MST until March 06 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming including Evanston and the Interstate 80 corridor. In Utah, Bear Lake and Bear River Valley, including Woodruff, Randolph and Garden City. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Sunday. The heaviest period of snow is expected from this evening through the overnight hours. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all area routes tonight through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
